title: Country Quiz App
description: Explore my world of web development expertise through this sleek and dynamic portfolio. Specializing in React, TypeScript, and the Context API, I've crafted interactive experiences, including a captivating Country Quiz Game. Leveraging the power of an external API (https://restcountries.com/), I create seamless connections to real-world data. Immerse yourself in my projects, witness my skills in action, and discover the possibilities of modern web technologies. Let's bring your digital ideas to life!
